intro: Psychotria micrantha, commonly known as the small-flowered psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in humid, shaded environments. The plant features small, elliptical leaves with a smooth texture and produces clusters of tiny, white to pale green flowers. Its fruit is a small, round capsule that contains numerous seeds. Psychotria micrantha is often found in lowland forests and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
